columns.name: bundle_id
columns.description: The identifier of the bundle used to create the WorkSpace.

columns.name: directory_id
columns.description: The identifier of the AWS Directory Service directory for the WorkSpace.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The operational state of the WorkSpace.

columns.name: error_code
columns.description: The error code that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be created.

columns.name: error_message
columns.description: The text of the error message that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be created.

columns.name: ip_address
columns.description: The IP address of the WorkSpace.

columns.name: root_volume_encryption_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the data stored on the root volume is encrypted.

columns.name: subnet_id
columns.description: The identifier of the subnet for the WorkSpace.

columns.name: user_volume_encryption_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether the data stored on the user volume is encrypted.

columns.name: volume_encryption_key
columns.description: The symmetric AWS KMS customer master key (CMK) used to encrypt data stored on your WorkSpace. Amazon WorkSpaces does not support asymmetric CMKs.

columns.name: modification_states
columns.description: The modification states of the WorkSpace.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags for the WorkSpace.
